articles.title: US inflation falls for 2nd straight month on lower gas costs - Business News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Sharply lower prices for gas and cheaper used cars slowed U.S. inflation in August for a second straight month, though many other items rose in price, indicating that inflation remains a heavy burden for American households.
